titleStmt.title: A general epistle to all Friends everywhere, scattered up and down in the world that they all may faithfully keep and walk in the truth of God, as they have received it, thereby to eschew evil and do good in their day and generations / written by a servant of God ... James Park.
titleStmt.author: Parke, James, 1636-1696.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
